title: Sports Skins would be super cool!
body:
I think it would be a cool way to represent countries and popular sports, here are just some ideas
Linebacker Zac
Slugger Ekko
Pitcher Ziggs
Linebacker Volibear
Horse Rider Kled

replies.body: I DIDN'T EVEN THINK ABOUT IT UNTIL NOW BUT SLUGGER EKKO SOUNDS AMAZING. A BASEBALL BAT WOULD FIT SO WELL ON HIM.
I was thinking about his w and how insane that would look if he was hitting a home run like that

They would have to play the horn that goes off when a home run is hit in MLB every time he ults.
And his Q would just be a massive bat flip XD
I sincerely hate the Academy skin line, and I know a lot of other people do too. Something about it makes all the characters look super edgy and emo and all that.
Meh the only one like is academy vlad cause the hot emo theme kinda suits him. Others are pretty boring

Boxer Vi
Basketball Ziggs (Three Point King compared to Dunkmaster)
I like basketball ziggs (one of my favorite champs and basketball is my favorite sport) and I think I would like a Zac skin for american football now that you mention vi
